author: genspring
msg: OPENEJB-1559 if the stateless session bean instance has an ejbCreate method, the container should treat the ejbCreate method as the instance's PostConstruct method

author: genspring
msg: default Object should be allowed for "type" in @resource because the type might be infered from field type or type defined in DD.

author: genspring
msg: OPENEJB-1560 Allow the user to call timer service method even when there are no ejbTimeout method in the ejb.

author: genspring
msg: Only get timout from timerMethodInfo if the info is not null.
